name: Psychic Pulse
description: Unleash raw psychic energy in all directions.

name: Dual Mind Storm
description: Hero and Tessa combine minds for a devastating air strike.

name: Earthbreaker Fist
description: Hero channels power through Kai's fist for a single devastating blow.

name: Tidal Acceleration
description: Skye's speed and Hero's power create a rushing water assault.

name: Flames of Resolve
description: Hero and Risa's determination ignites a blazing inferno.

name: Nature's Wrath
description: Channel the earth's fury through Matcha's connection.

name: Void Experiment
description: Douglas and Hero unleash experimental void energy.

name: Data Overload
description: Sev and Hero overwhelm enemies with pure data streams.

name: Elemental Trinity
description: Hero channels Air and Earth through perfect synchronization.

name: Balanced Assault
description: Water and Fire merge through Hero's psychic balance.

name: Gaia Force
description: Dual earth wielders unite through Hero's mind link.

name: Reality Breach
description: Science and AI merge to tear through reality itself.

name: Temporal Rush
description: Speed and wind combine for a time-bending assault.

name: Inferno Quake
description: Fire and Earth create an apocalyptic combination.

name: Unity Overdrive
description: The ultimate burst - Hero unites with three allies as one.
